paper_abstract: In this paper, we present new iterative methods for nonlinear algebraic equations by using modified homotopy perturbation method. We also discuss the convergence criteria of the present method. To assess its validity and accuracy, the method is applied to solve several test problems. (C) 2009 Elsevier Ltd. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Fourth-order and fifth-order iterative methods for nonlinear algebraic equations
